paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper reports a heterozygous Gly47Val mutation in the TTR gene associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy (FAP).

patients.phenotype: Familial amyloid polyneuropathy with gastrointestinal involvement

individual_records.phenotype_details: Recurrent diarrhea, muscle weakness, peripheral paresthesia, autonomic nervous system disorders
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A heterozygous Gly47Val mutation in the TTR gene was identified by DNA analysis.

functional_data.summary: The Gly47Val mutation is associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with the disease in the reported patient.
variants.additional_notes: This is the first reported case of the Gly47Val mutation in Japan.
key_quotes: A heterozygous Gly47Val mutation in the TTR gene was identified by DNA analysis.
Thus a diagnosis of FAP was established.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly reported in the text.
